ch.unibe.iam.graph.relation
Class ComparatorFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.relation.ComparatorFactory
public class ComparatorFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Contains several factory methods for instantiating new Comparator objects. Partly taken from "Java Collections", John Zukowski. Note: the Comparator-Objects overwrite the toString() method storing all necessary information to be recreated by the GenericLabelRelation. The string has the format: " " The GenericLabelRelation then reinstantiates the Comparator-Object calling ComparatorFactory.getComparator(" ")

Version:
$Revision: 1.13 $ $Date: 2004/05/02 12:03:02 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger

public static final java.util.Comparator intDeltaComparator(int pDelta)
Returns a comparator for Integer objects. Integers are considered equal within the range +/- pDelta (delta inclusive)

Parameters:
pDelta - the range

intDeltaRangeComparator

public static final java.util.Comparator intDeltaRangeComparator(double pDeltaRange)
Returns a comparator for Integer objects. The smaller Integer must be within pDeltaRange of the greater Integer to be considered equal: largeInt-(largeInt*pDelta)
Parameters:
pDeltaRange - the range
